Discussions.Discussion_Name: [Reminder] No lecture on 3.5 and register in Moses (MTS)

Messages.Author: David Karl
Messages.Content: Dear all, This is a reminder, that there will be no lecture tomorrow on the 3th of Mai. NOW FOR ALL STUDENTS (also exchange students): Please register for the portfolio exam in Moses (MTS) BEFORE 13.5. Find a walk-through in English here: https://www.tu.berlin/en/pruefungen/examinations/module-examinations For those of you who have already registered on MOSES, we have added you to the separate ISIS course for the practical part. Also, we've launched the first lesson for the PP on this dedicated ISIS page. Please note that this ISIS page is specifically for the PP course and is not identical to the lecture ISIS site (if you are not part of the PP  ISIS course, please register in MOSES and/or write us an email via 'ItAM@ceramics.tu-berlin.de'). IMPORTANT: The CAD lesson is an INDIVIDUAL task. Please ensure you work through it on your own and submit your files by 14.05. Please make sure you submit your answers in the lesson and upload your files in the assignment section! There will be a consultation hour in Room  EW KPK 008 - on Tuesday, 14.5, from 12:00-13:00.  All the best
